title: U.S. 9th Circuit Court of Appeals refuses to reinstate Trump's travel ban
text: “So now that that consultation can happen, the 90-day travel ban will be mooted out no later than a few months from now — before October, when the case could be argued” in the Supreme Court, said Margo Schlanger, a University of Michigan law professor and former civil rights official in the Obama administration's Department of Homeland Security.
summary: “So now that that consultation can happen, the 90-day travel ban will be mooted out no later than a few months from now — before October, when the case could be argued” in the Supreme Court, said Margo Schlanger, a University of Michigan law professor and former civil rights official in the Obama administration's Department of Homeland Security.
